config.enabled.description: Replace the Old Mariner with a seasonal mermaid.
config.enabled.name: Enable Seasonal Mermaids
spring.Rain.MermaidBuyYesAnswer: Take it, and let your love bloom.
spring.Rain.buyItemQuestion: Sprynglynn: Do you seek my pendant?
spring.Rain.hasItem: Sprynglynn: That pendant is a token of new beginnings. Share it with someone special.
spring.Rain.married: Sprynglynn: Lovely to see you're still head over fins in love.
spring.Rain.noRelationship: Sprynglynn: You'll find your soulmate, like the river finds the sea.
spring.Rain.notUpgradedHouse: Sprynglynn: Expand your home before you invite love to flourish.
summer.GreenRain.MermaidBuyNoAnswer: When the time is right, you'll know.
summer.GreenRain.MermaidBuyYesAnswer: Your love shines through any storm.
summer.GreenRain.buyItemQuestion: Sunneigh: Do you seek my pendant in these strange times?
summer.GreenRain.hasItem: Sunneigh: No storm will keep you from sharing that pendant with the one you love.
summer.GreenRain.married: Sunneigh: Strange weather for this time of year, isn't it? Stay close to those you love.
summer.GreenRain.noRelationship: Sunneigh: Love is as unpredictable as this weather. Stay true and you'll find your soulmate eventually.
summer.GreenRain.notUpgradedHouse: Sunneigh: With weather like this, make sure your home is prepared before you open your heart.
summer.Rain.MermaidBuyNoAnswer: When the time is right, you'll know.
summer.Rain.MermaidBuyYesAnswer: Tradition says you might hear your true love's voice if you listen to the pendant... Do you hear them?
summer.Rain.buyItemQuestion: Sunneigh: Shall I bless you with my pendant?
summer.Rain.hasItem: Sunneigh: Let that pendant find its way to your heart's match.
summer.Rain.married: Sunneigh: Your love is a lighthouse. May it always guide you home.
summer.Rain.noRelationship: Sunneigh: Love hides from you, like the sun behind clouds.
summer.Rain.notUpgradedHouse: Sunneigh: Make room in your house first, then in your heart.
fall.Rain.MermaidBuyNoAnswer: No rush, love will find its season.
fall.Rain.MermaidBuyYesAnswer: Yes, take it! Go cuddle up somewhere cozy with the one you love.
fall.Rain.buyItemQuestion: Pumpkyn: Do you seek my pendant?
fall.Rain.hasItem: Pumpkyn: That pendant whispers of loyalty. Share it with someone special.
fall.Rain.married: Pumpkyn: Congratulations on your joyful union.
fall.Rain.noRelationship: Pumpkyn: Forest paths are solitary; patience, your leaf will find the ground.
fall.Rain.notUpgradedHouse: Pumpkyn: A larger home is the foundation for a deeper relationship.
winter.Rain.MermaidBuyNoAnswer: I didn't even know it could rain in winter...
winter.Rain.MermaidBuyYesAnswer: Cold hands, warm heart. May your two hearts be entwined as one.
winter.Rain.buyItemQuestion: Glaciaire: Shall I bless you with my pendant?
winter.Rain.hasItem: Glaciaire: May that pendant strengthen the bond you choose to honor.
winter.Rain.married: Glaciaire: May the joy you share today last a lifetime.
winter.Rain.noRelationship: Glaciaire: Your heart is lonely, I have nothing for you.
winter.Rain.notUpgradedHouse: Glaciaire: Prepare your home against the cold before seeking love.
